name: MLP Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner pony! Find the perfect magical, friendship-filled name for your My Little Pony OC, your next fanfic character, or just for fun. Sparkle on!
introduction: Ever dreamed of trotting through Equestria with a name that truly *shines*? Our MLP Name Generator is here to make those dreams a reality! Whether you're crafting the ultimate fan character or simply want a touch of pony magic in your life, we've got you covered. Get ready to discover names that are as unique and enchanting as you are. Time to giddy-up and generate!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. Like, duh!
Keep clicking until you find a name that makes your tail swish with excitement!
Feeling fancy? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create your own unique pony persona!
Share your awesome new name with all your friends. Bragging rights are totally included.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my My Little Pony fan fiction?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! That's exactly what they're for! Go forth and create epic tales of friendship and magic!

faqs.question: Are the generated names copyrighted?
faqs.answer: Nope! These names are free for you to use as you wish. Unleash your creativity!

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send them our way, and we might just add them to the generator!

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! There are countless possibilities waiting to be discovered. Or, get creative and mix and match!

faqs.question: Is this generator suitable for all ages?
faqs.answer: You bet! It's perfect for anyone who loves My Little Pony, regardless of age. Friendship is magic, after all!

faqs.question: Will the generator give me a cutie mark idea, too?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. You'll have to brainstorm that on your own! But a cool name is a great start!
